translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このふざけた親父もどき、全部焼き払うわよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That ridiculous excuse for a father, I'm going to burn you all down!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるのか……これと…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're seriously going to do it... with this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるわ！　やるの！　き、消えろーーーー！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will! I will! G-goneーー!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの怒りの一撃が、迷宮内に轟いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic's blow of fury echoed throughout the labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜぇ、ぜぇ、ぜぇ…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huff, huff, huff........

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒しては起き上がるガンジー軍団を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Gandhi army kept getting up after being knocked down,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックとランスは起き上がらない法則を探し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic and Rance searched for the rule that would stop them from rising,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく最後の一人を打ち伏せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and finally brought down the last one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふ、ふは、ふははははは……見事だ、娘よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: F-fuha, fuhahahaha... Magnificent, my daughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ではお前に最強武器を授けよう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I shall grant you the strongest weapon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの懐から、ひとつの小箱が出てきて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From Gandhi's bosom, a small box came out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの手に渡った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was passed into Magic's hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ……小槌、かしら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This... is it a small hammer?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、ぶん殴るアレか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, that thing you bash people with?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持ってるだけでいいみたい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems you just need to carry it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい魔力……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amazing magical power...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷の力を引き上げてくれる、みたいね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like it boosts the power of lightning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふふ……迷わず往け、マジック……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe... Go without hesitation, Magic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は、いつでも…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will always be here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま、ガンジーはゆっくりと消えていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with that, Gandhi slowly vanished away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迷宮を出ると、既に日暮れだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Upon exiting the labyrinth, it was already sunset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やれやれ…………ああくそ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good grief... Ah, damn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とんでもなく疲れた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm incredibly exhausted...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私……ずっと、迷ってたのよね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've... been lost all along, haven't I?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親父を、越えなくちゃいけないじゃない？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to surpass my father, don't I?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、そんなことできるのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But can I really do that...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できると、思えるのか……でも、できた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can I believe I can? ...But I did it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が手伝ってやったからだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's because I helped you, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん。ランスと一緒なら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah. If I'm with Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親父にだって、負けない。でしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't lose to Dad either. Right?
Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと……この試練は、それを教えるために……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surely... this trial was meant to teach me that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい話にしようとしても無駄だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying to make it a nice story is pointless.
Ugh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夕日を爽やかに見上げようとした、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As she tried to look up at the sunset refreshingly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの動きが止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic froze in her movements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただただむさ苦しい試練だった……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was just a filthy, exhausting trial...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、叩いても叩いても湧いてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That endless Gandhi that keeps popping up no matter how much you hit it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無限ガンジー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The infinite Gandhi...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変にしぶといし……妙にテンションが高いし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's stubborn in a weird way... and strangely high-spirited...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそ、あの馬鹿笑いが耳にこびりつきそうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, that silly laughter is stuck in my ears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: や、やめてよーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: S-stop itーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう話だったことにして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's just say it was that kind of story,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過程のことは忘れたいの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to forget the process!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ、キューブの試練じゃなくて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This wasn't a Cube's trial,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壮大な悪戯だったんじゃないのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was just an enormous prank, wasn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違うって！　ランスが運命の相手なの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way! Rance is my destined partner!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今さらひっくり返すの、なしなんだから！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's too late to overturn it now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人はやいやい言いながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of them bickered noisily,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城へと一緒に帰っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and headed back together to the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真剣な顔つきで、マジックは姿見を睨んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a serious expression, Magic stared at the full-length mirror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足、二の腕……お腹……うん、よし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Legs, upper arms... stomach... yeah, alright...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身体のライン……崩れてないわよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My body line... hasn't changed, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌが生まれてから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Susinu was born...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細かく、チェックしていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She checked thoroughly.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このふざけた親父もどき、全部焼き払うわよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That ridiculous excuse for a father, I'm going to burn you all down!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるのか……これと…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're seriously going to do it... with this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるわ！　やるの！　き、消えろーーーー！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will! I will! G-goneーー!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの怒りの一撃が、迷宮内に轟いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic's blow of fury echoed throughout the labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜぇ、ぜぇ、ぜぇ…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huff, huff, huff........

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒しては起き上がるガンジー軍団を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Gandhi army kept getting up after being knocked down,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックとランスは起き上がらない法則を探し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic and Rance searched for the rule that would stop them from rising,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく最後の一人を打ち伏せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and finally brought down the last one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふ、ふは、ふははははは……見事だ、娘よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: F-fuha, fuhahahaha... Magnificent, my daughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ではお前に最強武器を授けよう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I shall grant you the strongest weapon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの懐から、ひとつの小箱が出てきて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From Gandhi's bosom, a small box came out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの手に渡った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was passed into Magic's hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ……小槌、かしら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This... is it a small hammer?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、ぶん殴るアレか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, that thing you bash people with?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持ってるだけでいいみたい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems you just need to carry it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい魔力……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amazing magical power...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷の力を引き上げてくれる、みたいね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like it boosts the power of lightning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふふ……迷わず往け、マジック……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe... Go without hesitation, Magic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は、いつでも…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will always be here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま、ガンジーはゆっくりと消えていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with that, Gandhi slowly vanished away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迷宮を出ると、既に日暮れだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Upon exiting the labyrinth, it was already sunset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やれやれ…………ああくそ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good grief... Ah, damn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とんでもなく疲れた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm incredibly exhausted...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私……ずっと、迷ってたのよね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've... been lost all along, haven't I?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親父を、越えなくちゃいけないじゃない？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to surpass my father, don't I?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、そんなことできるのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But can I really do that...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できると、思えるのか……でも、できた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can I believe I can? ...But I did it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が手伝ってやったからだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's because I helped you, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん。ランスと一緒なら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah. If I'm with Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親父にだって、負けない。でしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't lose to Dad either. Right?
Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと……この試練は、それを教えるために……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surely... this trial was meant to teach me that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい話にしようとしても無駄だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying to make it a nice story is pointless.
Ugh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夕日を爽やかに見上げようとした、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As she tried to look up at the sunset refreshingly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックの動きが止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic froze in her movements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただただむさ苦しい試練だった……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was just a filthy, exhausting trial...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、叩いても叩いても湧いてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That endless Gandhi that keeps popping up no matter how much you hit it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無限ガンジー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The infinite Gandhi...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変にしぶといし……妙にテンションが高いし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's stubborn in a weird way... and strangely high-spirited...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそ、あの馬鹿笑いが耳にこびりつきそうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, that silly laughter is stuck in my ears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: や、やめてよーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: S-stop itーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう話だったことにして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's just say it was that kind of story,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過程のことは忘れたいの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to forget the process!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ、キューブの試練じゃなくて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This wasn't a Cube's trial,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壮大な悪戯だったんじゃないのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was just an enormous prank, wasn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違うって！　ランスが運命の相手なの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way! Rance is my destined partner!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今さらひっくり返すの、なしなんだから！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's too late to overturn it now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人はやいやい言いながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of them bickered noisily,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城へと一緒に帰っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and headed back together to the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真剣な顔つきで、マジックは姿見を睨んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a serious expression, Magic stared at the full-length mirror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足、二の腕……お腹……うん、よし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Legs, upper arms... stomach... yeah, alright...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身体のライン……崩れてないわよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My body line... hasn't changed, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌが生まれてから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Susinu was born...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細かく、チェックしていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She checked thoroughly.
